full_summary:
================================
### Tender Notice: Anthrasil
================================

**Reference Number:** WS3615333096
**Publication Date:** August 8, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** August 25, 2022, 02:00 PM ET

**Contract Details:**

* **Contract Start Date:** October 5, 2022
* **Contract End Date:** March 31, 2026

**procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Summary:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) invites tenders for the supply of Anthrasil. The contract is scheduled to start on October 5, 2022, and end on March 31, 2026.

This contract is awarded under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

**Regions of Delivery:**

* **Ontario (except NCR)**

**Specification:**

This procurement is restricted to the exclusive rights of the winning bidder. 

**Contact Information:**

Joy, Sharon (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [Not Available]
Email: [sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sharon.joy@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For more information, please visit [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13779560?extsite=MTM3Nzk1NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13779560?extsite=MTM3Nzk1NjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) .
